activities: ON collects, processes, and stores personal data electronically and in hard copy form. The primary purpose for collecting this data is to enable global management of Human Resources including providing an accurate payroll and payment to the employees.
eucountries: Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: ON agrees to cooperate with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) in addressing disputes that cannot be resolved directly
